targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(distinct("temp_bytes")) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("server" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "db", "server" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("size_bytes") FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("server" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "db", "server" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("size_bytes") FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("server" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "table", "server" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("size_bytes") FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("server" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "table", "server" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("size_bytes") FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("server" =~ /$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "table", "server" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("n_live_tup") FROM "postgresql" WHERE $timeFilter and "n_live_tup" > 0 AND "server" =~ /$server/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "table", "server" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("n_dead_tup") FROM "postgresql" WHERE $timeFilter and "n_dead_tup" > 0 AND "server" =~ /$server/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "table", "server" fill(null)
